#summary The div element is a container element for other block-level elements.
#labels about-html,is-html-element,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > *div element*

== Usage ==

[SpecificationHTML5 HTML 5] says, "The `div` element represents nothing at all.  It can be used with the [ClassAttribute class], [LangAttribute lang], and [TitleAttribute title] attributes to mark up semantics common to a group of consecutive elements."

== Attributes ==

  * [DivAlignAttribute align]
  * [DivClearAttribute clear]
  * [DivColsAttribute cols]
  * [DivGutterAttribute gutter]
  * [DivHeightAttribute height]
  * [DivNowrapAttribute nowrap]
  * [DivWidthAttribute width]
  * [CommonAttributes common attributes]
